summary: VirtualBox emulation is present, but SDL version might not be superior to the Termux one which relies on pure TTY interface.

details.comment: VirtualBox emulation is present, but SDL version might not be superior to the Termux one which relies on pure TTY interface.
details.content: there's virtualbox emulation. but it is a sdl version. not better than the termux one, which is pure tty based.
